abstract: Citigroup, Blackstone Group and two Indian finance companies have signed an agreement to start a $5 billion infrastructure fund. The fund will aim to improve the country’s roads, ports and other facilities, the Indian finance ministry said in an e-mailed release Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup, Blackstone Group and two Indian finance companies have signed an agreement to start a $5 billion infrastructure fund. The fund will aim to improve the country’s roads, ports and other facilities, the Indian finance ministry said in an e-mailed release Thursday.

headline.main: Citigroup and Blackstone to Launch Indian Infrastructure Fund
